articles.description: Sam Iorio scored 22 points on five 3-pointers, blocked a career-best six shots and pulled down 10 rebounds, Sa'eed Nelson scored 17 and American defeated Boston University 60-56 Wednesday night, ending a seven-game skid.
articles.headline: Iorio scores 22, blocks 6 and American downs Boston U 60-56

articles.description: Garrett Covington's putback spun through the hoop as the horn sounded and Youngstown State scored the final nine points to storm back and defeat Oakland 75-73 Wednesday night, defeating the Golden Grizzlies in Youngstown for the first time in 17 years.
articles.headline: Covington putback lifts Youngstown State over Oakland 75-73

articles.description: Thanks to a road win at Purdue and a home victory over Iowa, Ohio State has climbed into the Top 10 for the first time in four years.
articles.headline: No. 8 Ohio State goes for fifth straight victory

articles.description: David Caraher scored 23 points, grabbed nine rebounds and passed for five assists as Houston Baptist roared back from a 17-point first-half deficit to keep Northwestern State winless in Southland Conference play, 77-70 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Houston Baptist roars back to beat Northwestern St, 77-70

articles.description: Tyler Hagedorn had 20 points and 10 rebounds and South Dakota opened the second half on a 31-8 run and beat Oral Roberts 85-67 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: South Dakota jumps out in 2nd half, beats Oral Roberts 85-67

articles.description: Florida State erases an 18-point deficit, forces overtime and defeats Clemson 81-79.
articles.headline: FSU rallies to knock off No. 11 Clemson in OT

images.caption: Florida State erases an 18-point deficit, forces overtime and defeats Clemson 81-79.
images.name: FSU rallies to knock off No. 11 Clemson in OT
